name: DayaLima Abisatya
description:
PT Dayalima Abisatya is a leadership company that offers complete human resource solutions with proven global standard solutions, to help clients to deal with transformation journey & challenges. We are a group of heroes with high energy, integrity & proven track record who are collectively passionate & accountable for end results. Our family is formed of Daya Dimensi Indonesia, Dayalima Recruitment, and Daya Dimensi Global, as well as Yayasan Indonesia Lebih Baik (YILB) as part of our commitment to create a better Indonesia. 
 DayaLima aims to keep making contributions to build a better Indonesia through leadership and talent development within organisations and greater society. We believe that leaders with integrity have a significant role in bringing a positive change for a better nation.
features: Be true to yourself; speak up and speak the truth

ShortDescription: PT Dayalima Abisatya is a leadership company that offers complete human resource solutions with proven global standards.
enhanced_description: PT Dayalima Abisatya, established in 2012 and headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, DKI Jakarta, is a leadership company offering comprehensive human resource solutions. They specialize in providing proven global standard solutions to assist clients with their transformation journeys and associated challenges. As part of a larger group that includes Daya Dimensi Indonesia, Dayalima Recruitment, and Daya Dimensi Global, DayaLima Abisatya focuses on leadership and talent development within organizations and the broader society. Their services encompass Recruiting, Talent Management, and Learning and Development, with a core mission to contribute to a better Indonesia by fostering leaders with integrity who can drive positive change.
